item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, May 4, 2025 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. What went wrong with wireless USB (160 points | 43 comments)
2. Gorgeous-GRUB: collection of decent community-made GRUB themes (212 points | 46 comments)
3. Show HN: Free, in-browser PDF editor (476 points | 105 comments)

5. Brian Eno's Theory of Democracy (59 points | 20 comments)
6. DuckDB is probably the most important geospatial software of the last decade (268 points | 82 comments)
7. Pascal for Small Machines (55 points | 4 comments)
8. Metagenomics test saves woman's sight after mystery infection (97 points | 34 comments)
9. Elvish – Powerful scripting language and versatile interactive shell (11 points | 1 comment)
10. Legendary Bose Magic Carpet Suspension Is Finally Going Global (147 points | 94 comments)
11. Programmers Guide to the AMIBIOS (1993) [pdf] (44 points | 9 comments)

14. Numerical Linear Algebra Class in Julia TUM (92 points | 3 comments)
15. Why can't HTML alone do includes? (291 points | 238 comments)
16. Show HN: Open-source sound effects and react library to spice up your website (15 points | 3 comments)

19. Britain's Latest True Crime Thriller: Who Killed the Sycamore Tree? (3 points | 1 comment)
20. When flat rate movers won't answer your calls (218 points | 145 comments)
21. QModem 4.51 Source Code (186 points | 69 comments)
22. Why I Am Not Going to Buy a Computer (1987) [pdf] (80 points | 42 comments)
23. We fell out of love with Next.js and back in love with Ruby on Rails (347 points | 315 comments)
24. A simple Common Lisp web app (33 points | 8 comments)
25. Google Gemini has the worst LLM API (80 points | 72 comments)
26. Run LLMs on Apple Neural Engine (ANE) (247 points | 100 comments)
27. Helpcare AI (YC F24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
28. The latest AI scaling graph – and why it hardly makes sense (21 points | 10 comments)
29. Minimum Viable Blog (318 points | 154 comments)
30. Why I stopped angel investing after 15 years (and what I'm doing instead) (184 points | 158 comments)
